 * - üíÅ Composable - Build exceptional applications with a modular, configurable build system

 */
name: @roots/bud-build

members.docComment:

 * Use {@link Build.Interface.config} instead

 */
members.name: rebuild

 */

 *

 * @decorator
 *
 * `@bind`
 *

 */
members.name: make

members.docComment:
/**
 * Ensure that a userInput is assigned to the class as a {@link @roots/bud-framework#Factory | Factory}
 *
 * @param input - input value
 *
 * @returns normalized value from user input
 *
 * @public
 */
members.name: normalizeInput
